descricao: When three working-class teenagers begin to attend an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

descricao: In a small town, a group of friends encounters supernatural phenomena while searching for a missing friend.

Leslie and Tom stake out a community garden for a marijuana thief.
Leslie judges a beauty pageant and defends her choice.
Leslie goes on a practice date to prepare for the real thing.
Leslie proves her hunting skills during a departmental outing.
Leslie deals with a scandal just before Christmas.

descricao: Ted tells his kids the story of how he met their mother, including adventures with his friends in New York.

episodios.descricao: Ted begins his story and meets Robin.
Ted throws a party to spend time with Robin.
Barney takes Ted to the airport to meet women.
Ted reconnects with an old flame.
Ted and Barney hit a club while Marshall and Lily attend a wine tasting.
Ted searches for a mysterious girl he met at a Halloween party.
Ted uses a matchmaking service to find love.
Ted and Marshall argue over their apartment.
The gang celebrates Thanksgiving in unique ways.
Ted wakes up with a pineapple in his bed and no memory of the night before.
The gang rents a limo to celebrate New Year's Eve.
Ted makes a questionable late-night decision.

descricao: The series follows a large and diverse family as they navigate hilarious situations and everyday life together.

episodios.descricao: Meet the Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker family and their unique dynamics.
Phil teaches Luke about responsibility while Claire worries.
Jay and Phil bond over model airplanes.
A family wedding brings out past conflicts.
Gloria and Claire clash during a family barbecue.
Claire and Phil face parenting challenges.
The family supports Manny at a fencing competition.
Phil's anniversary surprise for Claire goes awry.
A birthday party takes a chaotic turn.
The family experiences a less-than-perfect Christmas.
Gloria helps with Lily while Claire and Phil argue.
Jay and Claire confront surprising household issues.

descricao: Two extremely intelligent but socially awkward physicists navigate life and love.

episodios.descricao: Leonard and Sheldon meet their new neighbor, Penny.
Sheldon and Leonard help Penny with her messy apartment.
Leonard asks Penny out on a date.
Sheldon is fired from his job and explores other interests.
Leonard has a one-night stand with a fellow physicist.
The guys attend Penny's Halloween party.
The guys' gaming night is disrupted by Penny's friend.
Raj discovers he can talk to women when he's drunk.
Sheldon and Leonard argue over presenting a paper.
Leonard and Sheldon lie to Penny to avoid her performance.
Sheldon gets sick, and Leonard tries to avoid taking care of him.
Sheldon feels threatened by a young prodigy.

descricao: A group of students at an unlikely community college form a friendship and embark on comedic adventures.

episodios.descricao: Jeff Winger forms a study group to impress a fellow student.
Jeff and Pierce team up for a Spanish class assignment.
Abed takes a film class, revealing his passion for movies.
Annie and Shirley participate in a psychology experiment.
Jeff defends Britta in a college disciplinary hearing.
Troy is recruited for the football team.
The group attends a Halloween party hosted by Professor Duncan.
Jeff moves in with Abed after losing his apartment.
Jeff and Annie compete in a debate competition.
The group helps Chang with his problems.
The group takes part in a campus event about safe sex.
Shirley plans a Christmas party for the group.

descricao: A wealthy family loses their fortune and is forced to live in a small town they bought as a joke.

episodios.descricao: The Rose family moves to Schitt's Creek after losing their fortune.
Johnny attempts to sell the town while the family adjusts.
Johnny tries to get a local motel owner to buy back the town.
Moira and Johnny try to be better parents.
Johnny and Moira use a cabin to get some time alone.
Moira is hired as the spokesperson for a wine company.
David and Alexis attend a turkey hunt.
Johnny pitches a business idea to Roland.
Johnny helps Bob with his bagel business.
The family celebrates Johnny and Moira's anniversary.
Moira runs for town council.
Alexis celebrates her graduation, and David faces a decision.

descricao: When the patriarch of the Bluth family is arrested, his son Michael tries to keep the eccentric family together.

episodios.descricao: Michael Bluth takes over the family business after his father is arrested.
Michael struggles to prove himself while George-Michael manages the banana stand.
Lucille's overbearing behavior drives Buster to rebel.
Gob decides to break into prison for publicity, and Michael meets an attractive attorney.
Michael discovers a shocking secret about his father during a prison visit.
Michael tries to get his family involved in a charity auction.
Michael buys a car to assert his independence from his mother.
George Sr. prepares for a pageant in prison while Michael and Maeby bond.
Michael attempts to steal Gob's girlfriend from him.
Michael enlists Gob to teach George-Michael a lesson about drugs.
Michael hires a PR professional to improve the family's image.
Michael realizes he has feelings for Gob's girlfriend, Marta.
